description: Kopy Goldfields AB operates as a holding company, which engages in the production and exploration of gold. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Stockholm and currently employs 8 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2010-08-27. The Company’s operations are located in the Lena Goldfields area in the Irkutsk region of Russia. The firm has five wholly owned subsidiaries, namely LLC Kopylovsky, LLC Krasny, LLC Resurs, LLC Kopylovskoye Management and Kopy Development AB.
name: Kopy Goldfields AB (publ)
